job_details.duration: Contract with potential conversion to full-time

jd: From: Satyajeet Kumar, Adventa tech satyajeet@adventatech.com Reply to: satyajeet@adventatech.com Hi,Hope you are doing well today!This is Satyajeet working as Technical recruiter at Adventa Tech. I have an exciting opportunity with one of our client. If interested send me your updated resume with contact details, expected pay rate. Job Description -.NET Architecti do have sample resume if you need let me know :)Need candidate with proper LinkedIn & This person needs trading or wealth management industry experience Location : San Ramon, CA role is onsite 5 days/week, only submit candidates already living in the areaVisa : AnySkills | Must-Haves:* 8+ years of professional experience* experience in building UI-based applications (React/Angular), Winforms/WCF on Azure Cloud* AWM (Asset Wealth Management)/Financial Services experience* strong communication skillsNice to Have Skills:* Azure certifications* Bachelor's Degree or higherJob Description:We are seeking a .NET Architect with experience in building UI-based applications (React/Angular), Winforms/WCF on Azure Cloud. This is a contract role with potential conversion to full-time employment. The successful candidate will already live in the San Ramon, CA area and be able to go onsite 5 days/week. You must have AWM (Asset Wealth Management)/Financial Services experience.Skills:Must have played a role of Sr. ArchitectMust have a solid communication to collaboratively drive buildingTarget Architecture of the applicationTech Leadership across Client TeamsBuild a tech roadmap for the productProvide Tech Leadership to the implementation team for migration of D&C’s on-prem EWS application to cloudAWM experience requiredSkills | Must-Haves:* 8+ years of professional experience* experience in building UI-based applications (React/Angular), Winforms/WCF on Azure Cloud* AWM (Asset Wealth Management)/Financial Services experience* strong communication skillsNice to Have Skills:* Azure certifications* Bachelor's Degree or higher Thanks & Regards.! Satyajeet Kumar
